First of all, get childes dataset.

```{r childes_en_adults}
library(childesr)
adult_utterances <- get_utterances(role_exclude = c("Target_Child", "Child"), language = "eng", collection = "Eng-NA")
```

```{r}
print(nrow(adult_utterances))
head(adult_utterances)
```



```{r split_corpus}
print(head(adult_utterances))
for (year in seq(100, 150, by=1)){
  year_next <- year + 1
  subset_corpus <- dplyr::filter(adult_utterances,
                                 (target_child_age > year) & (target_child_age < year_next))
  print(head(subset_corpus))
  write.csv(subset_corpus, paste("period_", year, ".csv", sep = ""))
}

```
